statements: SELECT * FROM PlayerPerformanceMetrics WHERE goals_scored > 5;
SELECT player_name, goals_scored FROM PlayerPerformanceMetrics WHERE assists > 3;
SELECT player_name, assists FROM PlayerPerformanceMetrics WHERE fouls < 2;
SELECT player_name, goals_scored, assists FROM PlayerPerformanceMetrics WHERE player_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM PlayerPerformanceMetrics WHERE player_id = 10;
SELECT player_id, player_name, goals_scored FROM PlayerPerformanceMetrics WHERE assists = 0;
SELECT * FROM PlayerPerformanceMetrics WHERE player_name LIKE 'R%';
SELECT player_id, player_name, goals_scored, fouls FROM PlayerPerformanceMetrics WHERE assists < 5;
SELECT * FROM PlayerPerformanceMetrics WHERE goals_scored BETWEEN 3 AND 7;
SELECT player_id, player_name, goals_scored, assists FROM PlayerPerformanceMetrics WHERE goals_scored > 10;
SELECT player_name, assists, fouls FROM PlayerPerformanceMetrics WHERE player_id = 15;
SELECT * FROM PlayerPerformanceMetrics WHERE fouls >= 2;
SELECT player_id, player_name, goals_scored FROM PlayerPerformanceMetrics WHERE assists > 2 AND fouls < 2;
SELECT * FROM PlayerPerformanceMetrics WHERE player_name IN ('John', 'Alice', 'Bob');
SELECT player_id, player_name, goals_scored, fouls FROM PlayerPerformanceMetrics WHERE player_name = 'Alice';
SELECT player_id, player_name, goals_scored, assists FROM PlayerPerformanceMetrics WHERE goals_scored > 3 AND assists > 2;
SELECT player_id, player_name, goals_scored, assists FROM PlayerPerformanceMetrics WHERE assists = 0 AND fouls = 0;
SELECT player_id, player_name, assists FROM PlayerPerformanceMetrics WHERE goals_scored < 2;
SELECT * FROM PlayerPerformanceMetrics WHERE goals_scored = assists;
SELECT player_name, goals_scored, assists, fouls FROM PlayerPerformanceMetrics WHERE player_id > 10;
SELECT player_name, goals_scored, assists FROM PlayerPerformanceMetrics WHERE goals_scored >= 20 AND assists >= 10;
SELECT player_name, goals_scored, assists FROM PlayerPerformanceMetrics WHERE goals_scored > assists;
SELECT player_name, SUM(goals_scored) AS total_goals FROM PlayerPerformanceMetrics GROUP BY player_name;
SELECT player_name, AVG(goals_scored) AS avg_goals FROM PlayerPerformanceMetrics GROUP BY player_name HAVING AVG(goals_scored) > 15;
SELECT player_name, assists, fouls FROM PlayerPerformanceMetrics WHERE assists >= 5 AND fouls <= 3;
SELECT player_name, goals_scored FROM PlayerPerformanceMetrics WHERE goals_scored BETWEEN 10 AND 20;
SELECT player_name, COUNT(*) AS total_players FROM PlayerPerformanceMetrics;
SELECT player_name, MAX(goals_scored) AS max_goals FROM PlayerPerformanceMetrics;
SELECT player_name, MIN(goals_scored) AS min_goals FROM PlayerPerformanceMetrics;
SELECT player_name, SUM(goals_scored) AS total_goals, SUM(assists) AS total_assists FROM PlayerPerformanceMetrics GROUP BY player_name;
SELECT player_name, goals_scored + assists AS total_score FROM PlayerPerformanceMetrics;
SELECT player_name, goals_scored, assists, (goals_scored + assists) AS total_score FROM PlayerPerformanceMetrics WHERE goals_scored > assists;
SELECT player_name, fouls, CASE WHEN fouls > 5 THEN 'High Foul' ELSE 'Low Foul' END AS foul_category FROM PlayerPerformanceMetrics;
SELECT player_name, goals_scored, assists, CASE WHEN goals_scored > assists THEN 'Goal Scorer' ELSE 'Playmaker' END AS player_category FROM PlayerPerformanceMetrics;
SELECT player_name, goals_scored, assists, RANK() OVER (ORDER BY goals_scored DESC) AS goal_rank FROM PlayerPerformanceMetrics;
SELECT player_name, goals_scored, assists, DENSE_RANK() OVER (ORDER BY assists DESC) AS assist_rank FROM PlayerPerformanceMetrics;
SELECT player_name, goals_scored, assists, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY goals_scored DESC) AS row_number FROM PlayerPerformanceMetrics;
SELECT player_name, goals_scored, assists, NTILE(4) OVER (ORDER BY goals_scored) AS goals_quartile FROM PlayerPerformanceMetrics;

SELECT pp1.player_name, pp1.goals_scored AS goals1, pp2.goals_scored AS goals2 FROM PlayerPerformanceMetrics pp1 JOIN PlayerPerformanceMetrics pp2 ON pp1.player_id = pp2.player_id AND pp2.assists > 5;
SELECT player_name, goals_scored, assists, LEAD(goals_scored) OVER (ORDER BY goals_scored) AS next_goals FROM PlayerPerformanceMetrics;
SELECT * FROM player_performance_metrics;
SELECT player_id, goals_scored FROM player_performance_metrics;
SELECT player_id, assists FROM player_performance_metrics;
SELECT player_id, fouls FROM player_performance_metrics;
SELECT goals_scored, assists FROM player_performance_metrics;
SELECT goals_scored, fouls FROM player_performance_metrics;
SELECT assists, fouls FROM player_performance_metrics;
SELECT * FROM player_details;
SELECT player_id, player_name FROM player_details;
SELECT player_id, team_name FROM player_details;
SELECT player_id, position FROM player_details;
SELECT player_name, team_name FROM player_details;
SELECT player_name, position FROM player_details;
SELECT team_name, position FROM player_details;
SELECT pp.player_id, pd.player_name, pp.goals_scored FROM player_performance_metrics pp JOIN player_details pd ON pp.player_id = pd.player_id;
SELECT pd.player_name, pd.team_name, pp.goals_scored FROM player_performance_metrics pp JOIN player_details pd ON pp.player_id = pd.player_id;
SELECT pd.player_name, pd.position, pp.assists FROM player_performance_metrics pp JOIN player_details pd ON pp.player_id = pd.player_id;
SELECT pd.team_name, pd.position, pp.fouls FROM player_performance_metrics pp JOIN player_details pd ON pp.player_id = pd.player_id;
SELECT pd.player_name, pd.team_name, pd.position FROM player_details pd;
SELECT player_id, player_name, team_name, position FROM player_details WHERE position = 'Forward';
SELECT player_id, COUNT(*) AS total_metrics FROM player_performance_metrics GROUP BY player_id HAVING total_metrics > 5;
SELECT player_id, SUM(goals_scored) AS total_goals FROM player_performance_metrics GROUP BY player_id HAVING total_goals > 10;

SELECT player_id, player_name, team_name, position, goals_scored, assists, fouls FROM player_details JOIN player_performance_metrics ON player_details.player_id = player_performance_metrics.player_id WHERE goals_scored > 5 AND assists > 3;

SELECT player_id, player_name, team_name, position, goals_scored, assists, fouls FROM player_details JOIN player_performance_metrics ON player_details.player_id = player_performance_metrics.player_id ORDER BY goals_scored DESC, assists DESC;

SELECT player_id, player_name, team_name, position, SUM(goals_scored) AS total_goals, SUM(assists) AS total_assists, SUM(fouls) AS total_fouls FROM player_details JOIN player_performance_metrics ON player_details.player_id = player_performance_metrics.player_id GROUP BY player_id HAVING total_goals > 10 AND total_assists > 5;

SELECT player_id, player_name, team_name, position, goals_scored FROM player_details JOIN player_performance_metrics ON player_details.player_id = player_performance_metrics.player_id WHERE team_name = 'Manchester United';

SELECT player_id, player_name, team_name, position, goals_scored, assists, fouls FROM player_details JOIN player_performance_metrics ON player_details.player_id = player_performance_metrics.player_id WHERE player_name LIKE 'L%';

SELECT player_id, player_name, team_name, position, goals_scored, assists, fouls FROM player_details JOIN player_performance_metrics ON player_details.player_id = player_performance_metrics.player_id WHERE fouls > 10;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT team_name) AS total_teams FROM player_details;

SELECT team_name, AVG(goals_scored) AS avg_goals FROM player_details JOIN player_performance_metrics ON player_details.player_id = player_performance_metrics.player_id GROUP BY team_name HAVING avg_goals > 3;
SELECT player_id, team_name, COUNT(*) AS total_players FROM player_details GROUP BY team_name;

SELECT player_id, player_name, team_name, position, goals_scored, assists, fouls FROM player_details JOIN player_performance_metrics ON player_details.player_id = player_performance_metrics.player_id WHERE player_id IN (1, 2, 3);

SELECT player_id, player_name, team_name, position, goals_scored, assists, fouls FROM player_details JOIN player_performance_metrics ON player_details.player_id = player_performance_metrics.player_id WHERE team_name IN ('Real Madrid', 'Barcelona', 'Liverpool');
SELECT player_id, player_name, team_name, position FROM player_details WHERE player_id NOT IN (SELECT player_id FROM player_performance_metrics);

SELECT player_id, player_name, team_name, position, goals_scored, assists, fouls FROM player_details LEFT JOIN player_performance_metrics ON player_details.player_id = player_performance_metrics.player_id;

SELECT player_id, player_name, team_name, position, goals_scored, assists, fouls FROM player_details JOIN player_performance_metrics ON player_details.player_id = player_performance_metrics.player_id WHERE goals_scored BETWEEN 5 AND 10;

SELECT player_id, player_name, team_name, position, goals_scored, assists, fouls FROM player_details JOIN player_performance_metrics ON player_details.player_id = player_performance_metrics.player_id WHERE goals_scored > assists;
SELECT player_id, team_name, MAX(goals_scored) AS max_goals FROM player_details JOIN player_performance_metrics ON player_details.player_id = player_performance_metrics.player_id GROUP BY team_name;
SELECT player_id, team_name, MIN(goals_scored) AS min_goals FROM player_details JOIN player_performance_metrics ON player_details.player_id = player_performance_metrics.player_id GROUP BY team_name;
SELECT * FROM player_performance;
SELECT player_name, goals_scored, assists FROM player_performance;
SELECT * FROM player_performance WHERE goals_scored > 10;
SELECT player_name, assists FROM player_performance WHERE fouls < 5;
SELECT team_name, goals_scored FROM team_performance;
SELECT * FROM team_performance WHERE assists > 20;
SELECT team_name, fouls FROM team_performance WHERE goals_scored < 5;
SELECT * FROM match_results;
SELECT match_date, goals_scored, goals_conceded FROM match_results;
SELECT * FROM match_results WHERE goals_conceded > 2;
SELECT team_id, opponent_id, goals_conceded FROM match_results WHERE goals_scored > 2;
SELECT p_id, player_name, goals_scored FROM player_performance JOIN match_results ON p_id = team_id;
SELECT team_name, goals_scored, goals_conceded FROM team_performance JOIN match_results ON team_id = team_id;
SELECT player_name, goals_scored, goals_conceded FROM player_performance JOIN match_results ON p_id = opponent_id;
SELECT team_id, team_name, goals_scored FROM team_performance WHERE team_id IN (SELECT team_id FROM match_results);
SELECT p_id, player_name, assists FROM player_performance WHERE p_id IN (SELECT team_id FROM match_results);
SELECT DISTINCT team_name FROM team_performance;
SELECT MAX(goals_scored) AS max_goals FROM player_performance;
SELECT MIN(goals_conceded) AS min_conceded FROM match_results;
SELECT AVG(goals_scored) AS avg_goals FROM team_performance;
SELECT player_name, goals_scored FROM player_performance;
SELECT team_name, goals_scored, assists FROM team_performance;
SELECT player_name, goals_scored, assists FROM player_performance WHERE goals_scored > 5;
SELECT team_name, goals_scored, assists FROM team_performance WHERE goals_scored > 10;
SELECT player_name, assists, fouls FROM player_performance WHERE fouls > 20;
SELECT team_name, assists, fouls FROM team_performance WHERE fouls > 15;
SELECT player_name, assists, goals_scored FROM player_performance WHERE goals_scored > 3 AND assists > 2;
SELECT team_name, assists, goals_scored FROM team_performance WHERE goals_scored > 6 AND assists > 4;
SELECT player_name, goals_scored, assists FROM player_performance ORDER BY goals_scored DESC;
SELECT team_name, goals_scored, assists FROM team_performance ORDER BY assists DESC;
SELECT player_name, goals_scored, assists FROM player_performance WHERE player_name LIKE 'D%';
SELECT team_name, goals_scored, assists FROM team_performance WHERE team_name LIKE '%FC%';
SELECT AVG(goals_scored) AS avg_goals_scored FROM player_performance;
SELECT AVG(assists) AS avg_assists FROM team_performance;
SELECT team_name, AVG(goals_scored) AS avg_goals_scored FROM player_performance GROUP BY team_name;
SELECT player_name, MAX(goals_scored) AS max_goals_scored FROM player_performance;
SELECT team_name, MIN(goals_scored) AS min_goals_scored FROM team_performance;
SELECT player_name, SUM(goals_scored) AS total_goals_scored FROM player_performance;
SELECT team_name, SUM(assists) AS total_assists FROM team_performance;
SELECT player_name, COUNT(*) AS total_players FROM player_performance;
SELECT * FROM player_stats;
SELECT player_id, goals_scored FROM player_stats;
SELECT assists, fouls FROM player_stats;
SELECT * FROM team_stats;
SELECT team_id, goals_conceded FROM team_stats;
SELECT assists_given, fouls_committed FROM team_stats;
SELECT * FROM match_schedule;
SELECT match_id, home_team_id, away_team_id FROM match_schedule;
SELECT match_date FROM match_schedule;
SELECT * FROM match_results;
SELECT match_id, home_team_score FROM match_results;
SELECT away_team_score, match_winner FROM match_results;
SELECT ps.player_id, ps.goals_scored, ts.goals_conceded FROM player_stats ps JOIN team_stats ts ON ps.player_id = ts.team_id;
SELECT ms.match_date, mr.match_winner FROM match_schedule ms JOIN match_results mr ON ms.match_id = mr.match_id;
SELECT ps.player_id, ps.assists, ts.assists_given FROM player_stats ps JOIN team_stats ts ON ps.player_id = ts.team_id;
SELECT ps.goals_scored, ps.assists, ts.fouls_committed FROM player_stats ps JOIN team_stats ts ON ps.player_id = ts.team_id;
SELECT ps.player_id, ts.team_id, ms.home_team_id FROM player_stats ps JOIN team_stats ts ON ps.player_id = ts.team_id JOIN match_schedule ms ON ts.team_id = ms.home_team_id;
SELECT ms.match_id, mr.home_team_score, mr.away_team_score FROM match_schedule ms JOIN match_results mr ON ms.match_id = mr.match_id;
SELECT ts.team_id, ts.goals_conceded, mr.match_winner FROM team_stats ts JOIN match_results mr ON ts.team_id = mr.match_id;
SELECT ps.player_id, ps.goals_scored, ts.goals_conceded, mr.match_winner FROM player_stats ps JOIN team_stats ts ON ps.player_id = ts.team_id JOIN match_results mr ON ts.team_id = mr.match_id;
SELECT * FROM player_stats WHERE goals_scored > 10;
SELECT player_id, assists FROM player_stats WHERE fouls > 5;
SELECT team_id, goals_conceded FROM team_stats WHERE assists_given < 5;
SELECT match_id, home_team_id, away_team_id FROM match_schedule WHERE match_date = '2022-08-15';
SELECT match_id, home_team_score, away_team_score FROM match_results WHERE match_winner = 'Draw';
SELECT player_id, goals_scored, assists FROM player_stats WHERE player_id = 10;
SELECT team_id, goals_conceded, fouls_committed FROM team_stats WHERE goals_conceded < 10;
SELECT match_id, home_team_id, away_team_id, match_date FROM match_schedule WHERE home_team_id = 1 OR away_team_id = 2;
SELECT match_id, home_team_score, away_team_score, match_winner FROM match_results WHERE home_team_score > away_team_score;
SELECT player_id, goals_scored, assists FROM player_stats WHERE goals_scored >= 5 AND assists > 3;
SELECT team_id, assists_given FROM team_stats WHERE fouls_committed = 0;
SELECT match_id, home_team_id, away_team_id FROM match_schedule WHERE match_date BETWEEN '2022-08-01' AND '2022-08-15';
SELECT match_id, home_team_score, away_team_score FROM match_results WHERE match_winner != 'Draw';
SELECT player_id, goals_scored, assists FROM player_stats WHERE assists > 0 AND goals_scored < 5;
SELECT team_id, goals_conceded FROM team_stats WHERE goals_conceded >= 15;
SELECT match_id, home_team_id, away_team_id FROM match_schedule WHERE home_team_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT match_id, home_team_score, away_team_score FROM match_results WHERE (home_team_score - away_team_score) > 2;
SELECT player_id, goals_scored, assists FROM player_stats ORDER BY goals_scored DESC;
SELECT team_id, goals_conceded FROM team_stats ORDER BY goals_conceded ASC;
SELECT match_id, home_team_id, away_team_id, match_date FROM match_schedule ORDER BY match_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM player_performance_metrics;
SELECT player_id, player_name, goals_scored FROM player_performance_metrics WHERE goals_scored > 5;
SELECT player_name, assists FROM player_performance_metrics WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM match_details;
SELECT match_id, match_date, home_team, away_team FROM match_details WHERE match_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT stadium_name FROM match_details WHERE home_team = 'Barcelona';
SELECT * FROM team_stats;
SELECT team_id, team_name, red_cards FROM team_stats WHERE red_cards >= 2;
SELECT team_name, goals_conceded FROM team_stats WHERE team_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM player_stats;
SELECT player_id, team_id, matches_played, goals_scored FROM player_stats WHERE matches_played > 10;
SELECT assists, fouls_committed FROM player_stats WHERE player_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM match_stats;
SELECT match_id, team_id, goals_conceded FROM match_stats WHERE goals_conceded > 3;
SELECT goals_scored, red_cards FROM match_stats WHERE team_id = 1;
SELECT player_name, goals_scored FROM player_performance_metrics WHERE goals_scored > 3;
SELECT match_id, stadium_name FROM match_details WHERE away_team = 'Real Madrid';
SELECT team_name, yellow_cards FROM team_stats WHERE yellow_cards < 5;
SELECT matches_played FROM player_stats WHERE team_id = 4;
SELECT goals_conceded, red_cards FROM team_stats WHERE team_id = 2;
SELECT goals_scored, yellow_cards FROM match_stats WHERE match_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM player_performance_metrics WHERE goals_scored > 5;
SELECT player_name, goals_scored FROM player_performance_metrics WHERE assists >= 3;
SELECT player_name, assists, fouls FROM player_performance_metrics WHERE fouls > 10 AND goals_scored < 3;
SELECT * FROM match_details WHERE home_team = 'Barcelona' AND away_team = 'Real Madrid';
SELECT match_date, stadium_name FROM match_details WHERE match_date >= '2022-01-01' AND match_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT team_name, goals_conceded FROM team_stats WHERE yellow_cards > 20;
SELECT team_name, yellow_cards, red_cards FROM team_stats WHERE red_cards > 5;
SELECT player_id, team_id, matches_played FROM player_stats WHERE goals_scored > 2 AND assists >= 1;
SELECT team_id, SUM(goals_scored) AS total_goals_scored FROM player_stats GROUP BY team_id;
SELECT team_id, AVG(matches_played) AS avg_matches_played FROM player_stats GROUP BY team_id;
SELECT player_id, team_id, SUM(goals_scored) AS total_goals FROM player_stats GROUP BY player_id, team_id HAVING total_goals > 5;
SELECT match_id, team_id, goals_scored FROM match_stats WHERE goals_conceded < 3;
SELECT match_id, team_id, yellow_cards, red_cards FROM match_stats WHERE red_cards > yellow_cards;
SELECT match_id, team_id, goals_scored, goals_conceded FROM match_stats WHERE goals_scored > goals_conceded;
SELECT player_id, player_name, goals_scored, assists, fouls_committed FROM player_performance_metrics JOIN player_stats ON player_performance_metrics.player_id = player_stats.player_id;
SELECT team_id, team_name, goals_conceded FROM team_stats JOIN match_stats ON team_stats.team_id = match_stats.team_id WHERE goals_conceded > 10;

SELECT player_id, player_name, goals_scored, assists, fouls_committed FROM player_performance_metrics JOIN player_stats ON player_performance_metrics.player_id = player_stats.player_id WHERE goals_scored >= 5;

SELECT player_id, player_name, goals_scored, assists, fouls_committed FROM player_performance_metrics JOIN player_stats ON player_performance_metrics.player_id = player_stats.player_id WHERE assists < 2;

SELECT player_id, player_name, SUM(goals_scored) AS total_goals_scored FROM player_performance_metrics JOIN player_stats ON player_performance_metrics.player_id = player_stats.player_id GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT team_id, team_name, SUM(goals_conceded) AS total_goals_conceded FROM team_stats JOIN match_stats ON team_stats.team_id = match_stats.team_id GROUP BY team_id;
